relation.text: Quarters . I 'm very sorry Mrs Hamilton has been so much Indisposed but hope by this time shes
agree wt Mr Napier in his Prescription of Buxton . I am now
ements herself had she not so constant an Engagement at a french Boarding Schooll where she is a day
received last Post from my Btr dated the 3 / 14
Monday fortnight after his Letter was wrote
